# 知乎周刊·编程小白学 Python（总第 103 期）

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/zhihu-zhoukan-biancheng-xiaobaixue-python-zongdi-103-qi
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/zhihu-zhoukan-biancheng-xiaobaixue-python-zongdi-103-qi
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install zhihu-zhoukan-biancheng-xiaobaixue-python-zongdi-103-qi
zhihu-zhoukan-biancheng-xiaobaixue-python-zongdi-103-qi <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g zhihu-zhoukan-biancheng-xiaobaixue-python-zongdi-yilingsan-qi
zhihu-zhoukan-biancheng-xiaobaixue-python-zongdi-yilingsan-qi <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
